summary: A horror-comedy about two blue-collar factory workers (who happen to be jiu-jitsu experts) dealing with a ravenous, flesh-eating zombie uprising in Tokyo.
cast: Tadanobu Asano|Show Aikawa|Erika Okuda|Arata Furuta|Hina Matsuoka|Patrick Aghajanian|Kira Buckland|Kelly Green|Satoshi Hashimoto|Kyle Hebert|Kazuya Kakuta|Takuya Kakuta|Lauren Landa|Shelby Lindley|Mike McFarland|Jonathan Meza|Marianne Miller|Masaki Miura|Yoshiyuki Morishita|Yasuhi Nakamura|Taishin Ohtsuka|Patrick Seitz|Christopher Corey Smith|Harumi Sone|Melodee Spevack|Maria Takagi|Kaiji Tang|Mitsuki Tanimura|Kirk Thornton|Kazuo Umezu|Hiroshi Yamamoto
keywords: watching tv|man wears underwear|man wears eyeglasses|psychotronic film|zombie
title: Tôkyô zonbi
